llm_results: [{"detection_name": "LLM: GraphQL Introspection", "detection": "potential", "category": "Injection Attacks", "description": "The GraphQL response exposes an introspection-style payload (the \"__type\" object with type name and field list). This indicates the API is returning schema information to the client, allowing an attacker to enumerate types and fields in the GraphQL schema. Exposed schema metadata can be leveraged to discover sensitive fields, craft targeted queries, and increase the effectiveness of further attacks (data enumeration, authorization bypass attempts, etc.). Recommend disabling or restricting GraphQL introspection in production (or enforcing strict authentication/authorization for introspection queries) to mitigate this information disclosure.", "evidence": "Response contains a \"__type\" object: \"__type\": { \"name\": \"AuthoritativeSet\", \"fields\": [ { \"name\": \"id\" }, { \"name\": \"type\" }, { \"name\": \"identifier\" }, { \"name\": \"name\" }, ... ] }", "confidence": 0.95, "llm_analysis": {"is_vulnerable": true, "vulnerability_type": "GraphQL Introspection", "severity": "MEDIUM", "confidence": 0.95, "evidence": "Response contains a \"__type\" object: \"__type\": { \"name\": \"AuthoritativeSet\", \"fields\": [ { \"name\": \"id\" }, { \"name\": \"type\" }, { \"name\": \"identifier\" }, { \"name\": \"name\" }, ... ] }", "explanation": "The GraphQL response exposes an introspection-style payload (the \"__type\" object with type name and field list). This indicates the API is returning schema information to the client, allowing an attacker to enumerate types and fields in the GraphQL schema. Exposed schema metadata can be leveraged to discover sensitive fields, craft targeted queries, and increase the effectiveness of further attacks (data enumeration, authorization bypass attempts, etc.). Recommend disabling or restricting GraphQL introspection in production (or enforcing strict authentication/authorization for introspection queries) to mitigate this information disclosure."}}]
